newsitem.title: USA: Apple to continue Next WebObjects products.
newsitem.headline: Apple to continue Next WebObjects products.

text.p: Apple Computer Inc said, as part of its Internet strategy, it will continue to develop the WebObjects software product line it acquired from Next Software Inc.

Apple will release a new version of WebObjects -- a set of computer programs for setting up and managing sophisticated sites on the World Wide Web -- in spring. The company also will develop versions of the software to run on Apple computers.

Apple executives said at the Internet World trade show that Internet publishing will be a priority for the company. Apple will develop products to make it easier for customers to set up Web sites and to run businesses through them.
The company on Friday is expected to announce a restructuring plan that includes the discontinuation of several product lines and thousands of job cuts.
